B

balance(Classifier) - Method in class org.sandag.popsyn.balancer.Balancer
Balances PUMS sample household/GQ weights.
balanceAllPumaSamples - Variable in class org.sandag.popsyn.Version
An option that increases the sample of hh/gq used for balancing in each TAZ to include all hh/gq in the corresponding PUMA
BalanceGeographies - Class in org.sandag.popsyn.balancer
This class stores and records information related to balance geographies and related geographies (target, allocation, PUMA).
BalanceGeographies(IGeographyDao, Version) - Constructor for class org.sandag.popsyn.balancer.BalanceGeographies
Constructs a new BalanceGeographies objects with the specified IGeograph Dao and version object
balanceGeography - Variable in class org.sandag.popsyn.Version
The geographic level at which balancing occurs (typically TAZ)
balanceGQs - Variable in class org.sandag.popsyn.balancer.BalanceObjsSelector
The selected GQ balance objects
balanceGqs - Variable in class org.sandag.popsyn.balancer.Balancer
Set of Household objects used to store GQs after they have been balanced and separated from households
balanceHHs - Variable in class org.sandag.popsyn.balancer.BalanceObjsSelector
The selected HH balance objects
balanceHhs - Variable in class org.sandag.popsyn.balancer.Balancer
Set of Household objects used to store households after they have been balanced and separated from GQs
balanceObjs - Variable in class org.sandag.popsyn.balancer.BalanceObjsSelector
All selected balance objects (HH and GQ together)
balanceObjs - Variable in class org.sandag.popsyn.balancer.ConvergenceStat
The Household objects (HHs and GQs) that have been selected for balancing
BalanceObjsSelector - Class in org.sandag.popsyn.balancer
The balance object selector chooses balance objects (households and GQs) in a way that their weights won't subsequently be balanced to very small fractional values.
BalanceObjsSelector(int, Hashtable<IControlDefinition<Household>, Double>, Classifier, int, Version, double, double, RandomSeedManager<Integer>) - Constructor for class org.sandag.popsyn.balancer.BalanceObjsSelector
Constructs a new BalanceObjsSelector object with the specified balance zone, zonal control targets, Classifier, PUMA ID, Version, zonal household total, zonal group quarters total, and RandomSeedManager.
Balancer - Class in org.sandag.popsyn.balancer
This class handles the balancing of PUMS sample household/GQ weights to control targets by TAZ.
Balancer(Version, ITargetDao, TargetGrowthFactorDao, IWriterDao, IGeographyDao) - Constructor for class org.sandag.popsyn.balancer.Balancer
Constructs a new Balancer object with the specified Version object, TargetDao, GrowthFactorDao, WriterDao, and Geography Dao.
balancer - Variable in class org.sandag.popsyn.PopulationSynthesizer
Balances PUMS sample household/GQ weights to control targets by TAZ
balanceSelectionFactor - Variable in class org.sandag.popsyn.Version
The balance selection factor is multiplied by the zonal household or GQ total to yield the total number of HHs and GQs to be selected for balancing
balanceZones - Variable in class org.sandag.popsyn.balancer.BalanceGeographies

baseWeightMap - Variable in class org.sandag.popsyn.balancer.Discretizer
